info.senderName: NWS Chicago (Northeastern Illinois and Northwestern Indiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 01 at 3:12AM CDT by NWS Chicago
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Ogle, northeastern Lee and De Kalb Counties through 400 AM CDT... At 312 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Stillman Valley to near Ashton to near Amboy. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... DeKalb, Sycamore, Rochelle, Genoa, Cortland, Davis Junction, Kirkland, Waterman, Hillcrest, Kingston, Malta, Franklin Grove, Ashton, Creston, Lindenwood, Monroe Center, Lee, Steward, Fairdale and Kings. Including the following interstates... I-39 between mile markers 89 and 112. I-88 between mile markers 59 and 98. This includes... Northern Illinois University. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
